title: Big South Fork National River & Recreation Area: Popular Horse Trail Routes
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Trip Itineraries     Popular Horse Trail Routes              Popular Horse Trail Routes          On the maps, the trails are marked with an alternating red and white line. 1. Bandy Creek-Jacks Ridge Loop - 7.4 miles (2,472 KB pdf) 2. Bandy Creek-Charit Creek Lodge Horse Trail - 11.3 miles (2,462 KB pdf) 3. Bandy Creek-O&W Horse Trail - 14.6 miles (2,916 KB pdf) 4. Bandy Creek-Charit Creek-Station Camp Horse Loop - 14.6 miles (3,034 KB pdf) 5. Big Island-Pilot Wines Horse Loops - 9.8 and 12.2 miles (2,529 KB pdf)
